title: Enchanting Floral Sapphire and Diamond Drop Earrings
materials: 18K Rose Gold (GH) with Diamond accents and multi-colored Sapphires. Dwt: 1.22(218)
features: These earrings feature a delicate floral motif, with diamond-studded flower petals surrounding vibrant yellow sapphire centers. Cascading from the flowers are artfully arranged bunches of pink, blue, and yellow sapphires, creating a mesmerizing gradient of color. The overall design blends floral whimsy with geometric precision.
occasions: Perfect for special occasions such as weddings
or as a statement piece for everyday wear. Also suitable for modern Indian celebrations like cocktail parties and Sangeet.
description: A unique fusion of floral artistry and gemstone brilliance, these earrings are a testament to exquisite craftsmanship. The vibrant sapphires and sparkling diamonds create a captivating allure, making these earrings an unforgettable addition to any jewelry collection. The rose gold setting enhances the warmth and radiance of the gemstones.
